name: Soup Troop
description:
A game about fighting soup monsters for SUNY Poly Soup Jam 2020. As an executive of the club, this game cannot win the Jam. 20 waves of enemies that scales with up to 4 players.

Music is "Welcome" by RoccoW: https://roccow.bandcamp.com/track/welcome

Other key functionalities:

  • Escape: Closes game
  • F1: Toggles full screen
  • F5: Restarts game
